rooms.name: Entrance Hall & Lounge
rooms.description: Spacious entrance hall leading to a modern lounge area. Features include open space, natural light through large windows and sliding glass doors to the patio.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Open-plan living room with Mediterranean-style decor, accentuated by stone elements and wood finishes. Large windows promote cross ventilation.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: A dedicated dining space adjacent to the living area. Natural light is maximized through high ceilings and large bay windows, complementing the Mediterranean aesthetic.

rooms.name: Private Gym
rooms.description: Fully-equipped private gym designed with a focus on natural light, equipped with high-performance flooring, ventilation systems, and sound insulation. The design respects privacy while integrating seamlessly into the penthouse layout.

rooms.name: Open Terrace / Patio
rooms.description: A Mediterranean-style outdoor living space, perfect for dining al fresco, with stone pathways, pergolas, and ample greenery. It serves as an extension of the living areas for enhanced natural light and ventilation.

rooms.name: Storage & Utility Room
rooms.description: Functional storage space that includes a utility closet, laundry area, and small pantry. Designed to be discreet yet easily accessible from main living spaces.

openings.features: Large bay windows with wooden frames to enhance natural light.
